alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:54PM CDT until August 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ROCK AND EAST CENTRAL BROWN COUNTIES... At 954 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Long Pine to 10 miles southeast of Ainsworth to 14 miles northwest of Rose, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bassett and Long Pine. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 168 and 200. Highway 20 between mile markers 244 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
